author: gpetruc
body:
As discussed in the RECO/AT meeting of August 6th, I've made a branch that merges all PRs for the 74X and ready for merge (i.e. once they're fully signed), so that they can be tested as a whole.
At the moment it includes: #10175 #10366 #10361 #10362 #10363 #10364 #10593 
Summary on the [MiniAODSpring15pass2 twiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/MiniAODSpring15pass2#MiniAODSpring15pass2edittable1)
title: MiniAOD Spring15pass2 7.4.X (collection of all PRs)
